summary: A little improvement for family role players in Riften
descriptionHtml:
Why the heck would you have to decide wether to have children at Honeyside OR an enchantment table? I mean vanilla Skyrim remove it when you chose to built a childs room.
Well i bring it back. There is an additional enchantment table below the stairs, which will not disappear when changing the roo to a childs room. Netxt to it a dresser wit a small chest on it to store your soul gems and / or your other stuff for enchanting.

Just a little lore friendly mod that should neither contain any bugs nor cause compatibility issues, however there might be some when using complete overhaul mods for honeyside or its cellar.

If you find something let me know ... oh and have fun enchanting :)Â
author: Radioctive1988
